pageContext.claim: “It’s incredible how Democrats can all use their ridiculous sound bite and say that a Wall doesn't work. It does, and properly built, almost 100%! They say it’s old technology - but so is the wheel. They now say it is immoral- but it is far more immoral for people to be dying!”
pageContext.analysis: It's well known that drug cartels and others dig tunnels to get through the border in some cases. Most people immigrating to the United States illegally are overstaying their visas. A wall would make no difference for them.
